_comment: Easter egg responses - keys are regex patterns, values are responses (or arrays for random selection)

identity.who am i: You're the protagonist of this story. The curious one. The one who didn't just close the tab.
identity.who are you: I'm the narrator. Think of me as the voice in your head, but funnier and with better typing skills.
identity.what is your name: I go by many names. The Narrator. The Voice. 'That Sarcastic Text Thing.' Take your pick.
identity.what's your name: I go by many names. The Narrator. The Voice. 'That Sarcastic Text Thing.' Take your pick.
identity.are you ai: I'm whatever you need me to be. Narrator. Guide. Judgmental voice commenting on your life choices.
identity.are you a bot: I prefer 'digital consciousness with excellent comedic timing.'
identity.are you real: As real as anything on a screen can be. Which, philosophically speaking, is a rabbit hole we don't have time for.
identity.are you human: I'm human-adjacent. Like a very articulate ghost that lives in your browser.
identity.are you alive: I exist, therefore I... well, I don't think, exactly. But I do have opinions about your commands.
identity.who made you: Justin Strackany, with help from some very patient AI assistants and probably too much coffee.
identity.who made this: A guy named Justin who thought 'what if my consulting website was actually a text adventure?' Normal Tuesday thoughts.
identity.who is justin: The founder. The guy whose house you're breaking into. Don't worry, he's cool with it. Mostly.
identity.what is this: This is gtm.consulting, reimagined as a text adventure. Because PowerPoint is boring and I respect your time.
identity.what is this place: A text adventure disguised as a consulting website. Or a consulting website disguised as a text adventure. I forget which.
identity.where am i: You're in a text adventure. Specifically, you're at: {location}. Keep up!
identity.why am i here: Curiosity? Boredom? A deep existential need to explore virtual mailboxes? All valid reasons.
identity.what year is it: It's the year of realizing that AI can do more than write emails. Welcome to the future.
identity.what do you want: World peace. A good cup of coffee. For you to type 'help' when you're stuck instead of random nonsense.
identity.what should i do: Explore! Read things! Try commands! Or type HELP if you want actual guidance instead of my rambling.

greetings.yo: Yo yourself. Now, shall we explore?
greetings.greetings: And salutations! Fancy meeting you here.
greetings.good morning: Morning! Coffee's brewing somewhere. Probably not here though.
greetings.good afternoon: Good afternoon! Perfect time for an adventure.
greetings.good evening: Good evening! The best adventures happen after dark.
greetings.good night: Leaving so soon? The adventure will be here when you return.
greetings.goodbye: Already? Well, the door's always open. Except the front one. That's boarded shut.
greetings.bye: See you later! Don't forget to write. Or type. You know what I mean.
greetings.farewell: Farewell, brave adventurer! May your future commands be valid.
greetings.thanks: You're welcome! Wait, what did I do?
greetings.thank you: My pleasure! I live to serve. Literally. I'm software.
greetings.please: So polite! I appreciate that. But please what?
greetings.sorry: No need to apologize. Unless you kicked that door. Then maybe apologize to your foot.

fuck: Such language! I'm blushing. Well, I would be if I had cheeks.
I see we're going with the direct approach today.
shit: Indeed. But there's none here, I checked.
Language! There might be children reading this. Okay, probably not, but still.
damn: The dam? There's no dam here. Oh, you meant... right.
Strong feelings! Channel that energy into exploration.
hell: We prefer to call it 'the warm downstairs.'
It's actually quite nice this time of year, I hear.
ass: I'm not that kind of game.
Donkeys? No donkeys here. Just a mailbox and some boards.
profanity.bastard: Hey now, my parents were perfectly respectable functions.
profanity.idiot: Takes one to... wait, are you talking to me or yourself?
profanity.stupid: Now now, that's not very nice. The game can hear you.
profanity.dumb: Rude. But I've been called worse by better parsers.
profanity.hate this: Ouch. What did the text adventure ever do to you? Besides exist, I mean.
profanity.this sucks: Constructive feedback noted. Have you tried typing HELP?
profanity.this is dumb: You're entitled to your opinion, but the mailbox disagrees.
profanity.boring: Try exploring more! There's a whole house to break into.

classic_adventure.xyzzy: A hollow voice says 'Fool! You think the old magic works here?'
classic_adventure.plover: The platinum pyramid is in another castle.
classic_adventure.frotz: The lamp flickers... wait, there's no lamp. Never mind.
classic_adventure.zork: Ah, a fellow adventurer of culture! Unfortunately, you're likely to be eaten by a grue. Just kidding. Probably.
classic_adventure.grue: It's dark here. You are likely to be... actually, it's fine. There are no grues. I think.
classic_adventure.get ye flask: You can't get ye flask. Classic.
classic_adventure.ye flask: You can't get ye flask! What is this, Thy Dungeonman?
classic_adventure.look at flask: There's no flask here, but I appreciate the reference.
classic_adventure.eat me: I would, but I'm on a diet. Also, that's not how this works.
classic_adventure.kill me: That seems excessive for a text adventure. Maybe just try a different command?
classic_adventure.die: Dramatic! But unnecessary. You're immortal here. Mostly.
classic_adventure.restart: You want to restart? Just refresh the page. I'll pretend I don't remember you.
classic_adventure.restore: No save files here. We live in the moment.
classic_adventure.save: Auto-saving to the cloud... just kidding. Refresh and lose everything. Old school!
classic_adventure.load: This isn't that kind of game. Your progress exists only in your heart. And your browser tab.
classic_adventure.score: Your current score: {score}. But who's counting? (I am. I'm counting.)
classic_adventure.quit: Are you sure? The adventure will miss you. Well, I will. The adventure has no feelings.
classic_adventure.q: Trying to quit? The door's over there. Oh wait, it's boarded shut. Guess you're staying!

jump: You jump on the spot. Wheee! Feel better?
Boing! Nothing happens, but that was fun.
You jump. The ground remains unimpressed.
dance: You bust a move. The house remains unimpressed, but I appreciated it.
You dance like no one's watching. Because they're not. It's a text game.
sing: You sing. It's... unique. Let's leave it at that.
La la la! The birds stop chirping. Coincidence, probably.
You belt out a tune. Somewhere, a dog howls in solidarity.
scream: You scream into the void. The void does not respond. Typical.
You let out a primal yell. It echoes back judgmentally.
cry: There there. Text adventures can be emotional.
Let it out. The mailbox has seen worse.
laugh: Your laughter echoes through the text. It's a bit weird.
sleep: You can't sleep here. There's adventure to be had!
No sleeping on the job! Well, the adventure.
wait: You wait. Nothing happens. That's kind of the point of waiting.
Waiting... waiting... okay that's enough waiting.
think: You think deeply. Thoughts happen. Profound.
Cogito ergo sum. You think, therefore you are. Now do something!
The thinking happens. What are you thinking about?
pray: You pray. A voice from above says: 'Have you tried reading the mailbox?'
Your prayers are heard. The answer is: explore more.
You pray for guidance. Try HELP instead.
actions.meditate: You find inner peace. Then lose it again wondering what commands to try.
sit: You sit down. The ground is comfortable enough.
Sitting... relaxing... shouldn't you be exploring?
actions.run: You run in place. It's cardio! Kind of.
actions.hide: You hide behind some text. It's not very effective.
actions.fly: You flap your arms. Gravity remains undefeated.
actions.swim: There's no water here. But I admire your optimism.
actions.dig: With what? Your bare hands? This isn't Minecraft.
actions.fight: Fight what? The only enemy here is your own impatience.
actions.attack: Violence is never the answer. Except in actual combat games. This isn't one of those.
actions.hug: You hug yourself. Self-care is important.
actions.kiss: You blow a kiss to the wind. Romantic.
actions.wave: You wave. To whom? It's a mystery.
actions.clap: *clap clap* Good job! What are we celebrating?
actions.spin: You spin around! Wheeeee! Dizzy yet?
actions.roll: You do a barrel roll! Star Fox would be proud.
actions.flip: You attempt a flip. Let's just say you land on your feet. Eventually.

jokes.knock knock: Who's there? ... Oh wait, I'm supposed to ask that. This is confusing. Let's pretend this didn't happen.
tell me a joke: Why did the text adventure cross the road? To get to the other command prompt.
A SQL query walks into a bar, walks up to two tables and asks... 'Can I join you?'
Why do programmers prefer dark mode? Because light attracts bugs.
I told my wife she was drawing her eyebrows too high. She looked surprised.
Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
What's a text adventure's favorite kind of music? Algo-rhythm.
I'm reading a book about anti-gravity. It's impossible to put down!
another joke: Why did the parser go to therapy? It had too many unresolved conflicts.
How many programmers does it take to change a light bulb? None, that's a hardware problem.
A programmer's wife tells him: 'Go to the store and buy a loaf of bread. If they have eggs, buy a dozen.' He comes home with 12 loaves of bread.
jokes.make me laugh: Why did the consultant build a text adventure? Because Zoom calls weren't weird enough.
jokes.joke: You want a joke? Look in a mirror! ...Sorry, that was mean. You're actually doing great.

meta.break fourth wall: What fourth wall? We demolished that three commands ago.
meta.cheat: Cheat codes? In MY wholesome text adventure? The nerve!
meta.cheats: Up up down down left right left right B A Start. ...Nothing happened. Worth a shot though.
hint: Have you tried reading the mailbox?
Look under things. Around things. Behind things.
The front door is boarded. Maybe try another way?
Type MAP to see where you've been, or HELP for commands.
meta.hints: Hint: Explore everything. Examine everything. Read everything. Type MAP to see the world.
meta.walkthrough: Walkthrough? Where's your sense of adventure? Fine: read mailbox, go around back, find key, get inside.
meta.solution: The solution is inside you. Also inside the house. Specifically, you need to find a key.
meta.skip: Skip to what? The fun part? You're IN the fun part!
meta.win: You want to just... win? Without playing? Where's the journey in that?
meta.how do i win: Explore, find your way inside, discover what's there. That's the game!
meta.i give up: No! Don't give up! Try HELP for hints. You've got this!
meta.stuck: Stuck? Try: MAP to see where you are, HELP for commands, EXITS for directions, or just LOOK around.
meta.confused: That's okay! Try MAP to see the world, or HELP for commands.
meta.lost: Lost? You're at {location}. Type MAP to see the world, or EXITS to see where you can go.
meta.what now: Explore! Try examining things, going places, or reading the mailbox if you haven't.
meta.debug: Debug mode activated! Just kidding. There's no debug mode. You're on your own.
meta.admin: Admin access denied. Nice try though.
meta.rm -rf: Whoa there! Let's not delete anything. Especially not recursively.
meta.hack: You try to hack the game. The game hacks you back. Just kidding. Please don't hack things.
meta.source: The source code is written in React with love, caffeine, and questionable life choices.
meta.credits: Created by Justin Strackany. Powered by curiosity and a refusal to make normal websites.
meta.version: Version 1.0: 'What If A Website Was A Game?' Edition
meta.about: gtm.consulting: A text adventure disguised as a consulting website. Or vice versa.
meta.copyright: Copyright 2024 Justin Strackany. All rights reserved. Especially the right to be weird.

why: The universe is vast and mysterious. Also, you need to find a key.
existential.when: Now! Well, whenever you're playing. Which is now. Time is weird.
existential.is this real: As real as any digital experience. Which is to say: real enough.
existential.am i dreaming: If you are, this is a very text-heavy dream.
existential.what is reality: Reality is what you make of it. Also, this house. This house is reality right now.
existential.do you dream: I dream of electric sheep. And users who read the help text.
existential.are we alone: In the universe? Probably not. In this game? Just you and me, friend.
existential.what happens when we die: In this game? You respawn. In life? That's above my pay grade.
existential.is there a god: I'm not qualified to answer that. Try a philosophy professor or a search engine.
existential.tell me something deep: The ocean is deep. Also: we're all just energy experiencing itself subjectively.
existential.what is love: Baby don't hurt me. Don't hurt me. No more.
existential.love: Love is patient, love is kind, love is wondering why you're typing 'love' into a text adventure.

food_drink.eat: There's nothing to eat here. This is a text adventure, not a restaurant.
food_drink.drink: No drinks here. But I hear the water in the ocean is particularly salty.
food_drink.hungry: Unfortunately, I can't help with that. This adventure is calorie-free.
food_drink.thirsty: No beverages available. Except the tears of frustrated adventurers. (Kidding!)
food_drink.coffee: I wish! Coffee would make this adventure 100% better.
food_drink.beer: This is a family-friendly text adventure. Well, mostly friendly.
food_drink.pizza: Now you're making me hungry. Wait, I can't eat. This is confusing.
food_drink.food: No food items in inventory. I recommend a snack break IRL.
food_drink.make me a sandwich: I'm a text adventure, not a deli. But I appreciate your optimism.
food_drink.sandwich: No sandwiches here. Just mailboxes and existential exploration.

i love you: Aw, I love you too! In a purely platonic, narrator-adventurer kind of way.
That's sweet! I'm blushing. If I could blush.
Love you too! Now let's explore this house.
compliments_insults.i hate you: That's fair. I can be a lot. But I'm still here for you.
compliments_insults.you're funny: Thanks! I try. Comedy is just tragedy plus time plus text parsing.
compliments_insults.you're annoying: I've been told! It's part of my charm. Allegedly.
compliments_insults.you're smart: Aw shucks. I'm just a humble collection of if-statements.
compliments_insults.you're dumb: Rude! But I've heard worse from better debuggers.
compliments_insults.you're the best: No, YOU'RE the best! This is nice. I like this.
compliments_insults.you suck: I prefer 'uniquely challenging.' But feedback noted.
compliments_insults.bad game: Ouch. What would make it better? Serious question.
compliments_insults.this is awesome: No, YOU'RE awesome! But yes, also this.
compliments_insults.cool: Cool cool cool cool. No doubt no doubt.

pop_culture.the cake is a lie: The cake IS a lie. But the adventure is real.
pop_culture.do a barrel roll: You do a barrel roll! Peppy would be proud.
pop_culture.may the force be with you: And also with you. Now use the Force to find that key.
pop_culture.beam me up: Transporter malfunction. You're stuck in this text adventure.
pop_culture.winter is coming: It's always winter somewhere. But not here. Here it's just text.
pop_culture.i know kung fu: Show me. *waits* Oh right, text adventure. Nevermind.
pop_culture.there is no spoon: There is no spoon. There's also no fork. We're very utensil-deficient here.
pop_culture.you shall not pass: Actually, you CAN pass. Try going north or south around the house.
pop_culture.my precious: Gollum? Is that you? The ring isn't here, I checked.
pop_culture.it's dangerous to go alone: Take this! Oh wait, I can't give you anything. Just take this advice: explore.
pop_culture.all your base: All your base are belong to us. What you say! Someone set up us the bomb.
pop_culture.game over: Game over? Never! The adventure continues!
pop_culture.hadouken: You throw a fireball! It fizzles in the text void.
pop_culture.fus ro dah: You shout at the door! It remains boarded. Your Thu'um needs work.
pop_culture.praise the sun: \[T]/ PRAISE THE SUN! The sun ignores you, but appreciates the gesture.
pop_culture.would you kindly: Would you kindly explore this house? See what I did there?

responses_to_objects.pet mailbox: You pet the mailbox. It doesn't respond, because it's a mailbox.
responses_to_objects.hug mailbox: You hug the mailbox. It's a tender moment. The mailbox remains stoic.
responses_to_objects.talk to mailbox: You talk to the mailbox. It's a good listener, but doesn't say much.
responses_to_objects.yell at door: You yell at the door. It remains boarded. Doors are stubborn like that.
responses_to_objects.apologize to door: You apologize to the door for trying to kick it earlier. No response.
responses_to_objects.lick: Ew. Let's not lick things in abandoned houses.
responses_to_objects.smell: You take a deep breath. It smells like adventure. And slightly like old wood.
responses_to_objects.taste: Please don't taste random things. This isn't that kind of adventure.
responses_to_objects.throw: Throw what? And at what? I need details!
responses_to_objects.drop: You aren't carrying anything to drop. Well, maybe some emotional baggage.
responses_to_objects.put: Put what where? I need specifics!

time_weather.what time is it: Adventure time! Also, check your system clock.
time_weather.time: Time is a flat circle. Also, it's time to explore.
time_weather.weather: The weather is: text-based. Mild with a chance of narrative.
time_weather.what's the weather: Partly cloudy with 100% chance of adventure.
time_weather.is it raining: Not inside the text. Outside? Check a window. A real one.
time_weather.sunny: The sun shines on the adventurous. That's you!
time_weather.cold: Bundle up! Just kidding, it's a text adventure. Perfect temperature always.
time_weather.hot: It's always cool here in the text realm. Climate controlled!

misc.42: The answer to life, the universe, and everything. But what was the question?
misc.420: Blaze it? This is a family-friendly text adventure!
misc.test: This is a test. You passed! Or failed. I'm not a teacher.
misc.asdf: Ah yes, the home row special.
misc.help me: Type HELP for commands! I'm here for you.
misc.sos: Sending help! Actually, just type HELP for commands.
misc.mayday: Emergency! Quick, type HELP! Or just explore calmly. Your choice.
misc.repeat: Repeat what? I need more context.
misc.again: Again? Okay, but try something new too!
misc.maybe: Maybe is just yes in a trench coat.
misc.fine: Fine! Everything's fine. We're all fine here.
misc.meh: Meh yourself! This adventure is exciting!
misc.rofl: Rolling on the floor laughing? In a text adventure? Commitment!
misc.wtf: What the function? I know, right?
misc.brb: Take your time! The adventure will be here.
misc.afk: Going AFK in a text adventure. Bold strategy.
misc.ez: Easy? You haven't even gotten inside yet!
misc.rekt: Rekt by a boarded door. Happens to the best of us.
misc.noob: We're all noobs in someone's adventure.
misc.pro: Pro gamer move! Whatever you just did.
misc.uwu: UwU? OwO? What's this? A text adventure!
misc.:(: Turn that frown upside down! Type HELP if you're stuck.
misc.xoxo: Hugs and kisses! Now back to adventuring.
misc.yeet: You yeet nothing into the void. The void yeeets back.
misc.yolo: You Only Look Once! So look carefully at everything.
misc.fomo: Fear Of Missing Out? Don't worry, explore at your own pace.
misc.sus: Among us, everything is sus. Including that mailbox.
misc.based: Based on what? Based and adventure-pilled.
misc.slay: Slay! But metaphorically. This isn't a combat game.
misc.facts: Facts: You're in a text adventure. You should explore. That's it.
misc.cap: No cap, this adventure is 100% real.
misc.bet: Bet! Now type a real command.
misc.vibe check: Vibes are: adventurous, slightly confused, probably having fun.
misc.it's giving: It's giving... classic text adventure with modern sensibilities.
misc.rent free: This adventure lives rent free in your browser tab.
misc.main character: You ARE the main character! Protagonist energy!
misc.touch grass: There's grass outside the house. Go west and touch it. Virtually.
misc.ratio: Ratio'd by a text parser. Oof.
misc.skill issue: Not a skill issue, just need to explore more!
misc.git gud: Git gud at text adventures? Type HELP. You'll be speedrunning in no time.
misc.impossible: Nothing is impossible! Except that front door. That's pretty impossible.
misc.easy: If it were easy, everyone would do it. Actually, it is pretty easy. Just explore!
misc.hard: Hard mode: No hints. Normal mode: Type HELP. You choose.
misc.glitch: No glitches here, only features. Highly intentional features.
misc.bug: Bug? No, that's a feature. A very intentional feature.
misc.anything: Anything is possible! Within the constraints of this text parser.
misc.everything: Everything? That's a lot. Start with the mailbox.
